Great game and awesome upload aside from this problem...

"Error loading saved game":

This is NOT a problem with game, this is a problem with VISTA, and in this case it's easy to resolve...

I make two step (don't know which one is help me, so make both):
At start, bring Properties of installed folder "Jade Empire"
Step 1: Uncheck "Read only".
Step 2: In "Security", give "Full Control" to Users of your system.

And - Voila!!!

Has anyone got the cutscenes to work?
It plays great, and thanks for that, but I want me some cutscenes!

I have the movie folder in my JE folder, as I was told to do.
So, what's up?
IssacRx > All non-story cutscenes have been removed from this _ripped_ version of the game.

This Fix will not add cutscenes to the game. If you want to see the movies, you'll have to download a full Image release (about 6.4gb).

But you don't have to install the game again!

Simply extract all "/data/movies*.rar" files from the newly downloaded Image to your game folder. This should also fix the black screen problems.
